sections.title: WARNINGS:
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">Do not use</content>if the tamper evident strip is broken or removed from the base of the cap.

 </paragraph>
                  <paragraph/>
                  <paragraph/>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Do not use if the tamper evident strip is broken or removed from the base of the cap.

sections.title: DIRECTIONS:
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>Take 5 – 10 drops orally, three times per day.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Take 5 – 10 drops orally, three times per day.

sections.display: OTC - KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN SECTION
sections.title: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN:
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>
                     <content styleCode="bold">KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN:</content>In case of overdose, get medical help or call a Poison Control Center right away.

 </paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN: In case of overdose, get medical help or call a Poison Control Center right away.

sections.title: INDICATIONS:
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph/>
                  <paragraph>This remedy is indicated for symptoms associated with colds; flu, inflamed nasal passages, pre- and post- influenza neuralgia, laryngitis, sinusitis and myalgias according to traditional homeopathic practice.*</paragraph>
                  <paragraph/>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: This remedy is indicated for symptoms associated with colds; flu, inflamed nasal passages, pre- and post- influenza neuralgia, laryngitis, sinusitis and myalgias according to traditional homeopathic practice.*

sections.title: QUESTIONS:
sections.text_xhtml:
Call toll-free from US & CA +1-844-880-4881 or visit our website
www.biological-health.com
sections.text_plain: Call toll-free from US & CA +1-844-880-4881 or visit our website www.biological-health.com

sections.title: PURPOSE:
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>For internal indications according to traditional homeopathic practice.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: For internal indications according to traditional homeopathic practice.

sections.display: OTC - PREGNANCY OR BREAST FEEDING SECTION
sections.title: If pregnant or breast feeding...
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>If pregnant or breast feeding, ask a health professional before use.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: If pregnant or breast feeding, ask a health professional before use.

sections.title: ASK DOCTOR:
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>Consult a physician if symptoms worsen or last for more than 7 days.</paragraph>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Consult a physician if symptoms worsen or last for more than 7 days.

sections.title: OTHER INFORMATION:
sections.text_xhtml:
<text>
                  <paragraph>Protect from light and heat.</paragraph>
                  <paragraph>For professional distribution only.</paragraph>
                  <paragraph>*These statements are based upon traditional homeopathic practice. They have not been reviewed by the Food and Drug Administration.</paragraph>
                  <paragraph/>
                  <paragraph/>
               </text>
sections.text_plain: Protect from light and heat. For professional distribution only. *These statements are based upon traditional homeopathic practice. They have not been reviewed by the Food and Drug Administration.
